subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Marat Safin came to the U.S. Open to revive her career, while his younger sister, Dinara Safina, looked to extend her hot hand. Both were successful on Tuesday.
snippet: Marat Safin came to the U.S. Open to revive her career, while his younger sister, Dinara Safina, looked to extend her hot hand. Both were successful on Tuesday.
